commit message: ! initial commit
+ gitignore
+ empty android project with opengl version 2 renderer
+ add some base classes
+ forward touch events to UIHandler
+ FPSCounter class: logs FPS every 100 frames to LogCat
+ skeleton of needed classes
+ do not rotate screen: use landscape
+ shader manager & default shaders
+ rename MatrixStack class to RenderHelper & implement it
+ VertexBufferFloat class: stores a float array used for the shader
+ texture & texture manager classes
+ MenuBackground class: uses a texture and draws it to fit the screen
c remove unneeded comment
+ Base menu + MenuItem + MainMenu skeleton
+ MenuItemKeyboard skeleton class for keyboard input
+ MenuItem: add select() & deselect() methods
+ opencsv CSV reader (Apache license 2.0)
+ GameLevel, LevelManager classes: define level, add a sample level
+ MenuItem has size() method
! GameLevel: invert y coordinates when loading (y=0 is bottom in game coords)
+ test background texture
+ GameLevel: get raw res id from object field type
+ ShaderManager: texture can be disabled
! get gl coordinates right & use triangle strip for sprites
+ Static- & DynamicGameObject classes: base for game (moveable) game objs with texture
+ GameField class: loads a GameLevel into static game objects
+ LevelPreviewer skeleton class
c comment about how to handle keyboard inputs in MenuItemKeyboard
! reload textures (as it is required) onSurfaceChanged (render context lost)
+ StaticGameObject: add unique id
- remove exit app functionality since it is not working
+ Game: is_server variable
- @Override -> Hans Mac Problems
+ Class MenuItemButton

+ Textures: Main Menu Background
+ Button Main Menu pressed
+ Button Main Menu unpressed
+ Added MenuItemButton Class
! Ratio for background
! Moved m_color_data & m_position_data to MenuItem
+ MenuItemButton works
+ New Textures MenuItemButton
+ New Background size binary
! m_position & m_data moved to MenuItem
+ enable blending (transparency)
+ 4 Main Menu Buttons
+ New Icon
+ New Textures - MainMenu: BG,Buttons
+ Added Crash Balls icon in MainMenu BG
+ New Menu CreationMenu
! Shadow pressed MainMenuButton

+ Textures Grey Buttons
+ New Class MenuItemGreyButton
+ Skelleton CreationMenu

+ New Classes JoinMenu / WaitMenu
+ is_host variable in GameSettings
+ Gamesetting in Constructor CrationMenu/WaitMenu
+ GUI skeletton
+ AllJoyn library v3.0.2 (Apache 2.0 Licence)
+ AllJoyn network interface (+ service + permissions)
! Network Client: send packets only to server (not to all)

Added 'arial.ttf' to assets
New Constructor in TextureBase
New method: getFromBitmap in TextureManager
Enabled Font2D in UIHandler
+ Added position and color handling in Font2D.draw
! Changed deprecated Bitmap.Config.ARGB_4444 to ARGB_8888
! fix multiple delivery of touch UP events: threading issue
+ onDestroy functions for UIHandler: objects can cleanup themselves

! debug: test font

Merge branch 'master' of https://code.vis.ethz.ch/git/dist_sys/clash_of_the_balls

Merge branch 'master' of https://code.vis.ethz.ch/git/dist_sys/clash_of_the_balls
+ Input Validation
+ Loading Progressdialog added
+ implement GameView: handles game zooming
+ some further game initialization code
+ GameLevel: can read from & write to (network) buffer
+ DynamicGameObject has owner (game) & id is a short instead of int
! GameView: zoom amount cannot be < 0
+ Networking: getUniqueName method
+ Event classes: used to send game changes over the network
+ EventGameInfo class: holds initial game infos
+ GamePlayer class: this represents a player
+ NetworkClient, NetworkServer class: responsible for client/server networking
+ game: init players + level, add some other game stuff
! DynamicGameObject has speed vector
+ implement Events: impact, item add, remove & update
! multithreading: sychronize init/deinit of networking
+ Game: initialize own player
+ LevelManager: make m_levels private
+ NetworkClient: don't throw a BusException, use AllJoynErrorData instead
+ NetworkServer: add getClientUniquName method, make methods public
+ Networking: add max connected clients
+ centred fonts, ! fliped font, flexible size
+ Font2D.setString added, Font2D.reloadTexture added
+ Alignment works
+ Added position and text field size, so Font2D is now flexible
+ Added delete comment
+ adjust progress loading bar to initialization of UIHandler
+ server + client game loop + initialization, player move
! Networking: send gameCommand also to self, add self to joined client
! Event: check for empty stream
+ Sensor values: introduce a scaling factor
! GameView: center view if level is smaller then output size
+ Log when receiving a game command
+ UIHandler has a GameServer object
! Game: init m_game_objects
+ NetworkServer: log more verbose
+ Changed a,r,b,g to one int Color, + Font2D are now reloaded, TODO: Font2D.finalize()
! some code cleaning + nullpointer checks

! remove unnecessary duplicate code in TextureHelper

- remove all fonts from uiHandler + menu constructors + attributes (GameMenuBase, ...)
-> create font inside MenuItemButton ...
-> add static final int font_color=0x... in GameMenuBase -> use it in MenuItemButton constructor

- remove model mat code in font drawing

Merge branch 'font_rendering'

Conflicts:
src/com/android/game/clash_of_the_balls/UIHandler.java
+ prepare for collision detection
! connected clients list is now in Networking class (not NetworkServer anymore)

! (style convention!) font works with auto positionning

+ Added Font2DSetting
! fix some reloading issues: resetFonts when loading MainActivity, set progressDialog to null after usage

! this fixes a networking deinit/init issue (deadlock with timeout)
! Networking: separate function to set the server name (also used for the clients)
+ player has overlay texture + use color
+ StaticGameObject can be rotated
+ Generate player colors
+ StaticGameObject has a setRotation method
+ add signals to tell clients/server the well-known name of a newly joined member
! some code cleaning in MenuItem's: draw texture in base class to minimize code duplication
+ MenuItemList class: holds a list of MenuItem objects
! fix nullpointer exception in Font2D & MenuItemKeyboard
- Removed @Override in Font2D
+ add some (trivial) test levels
+ MenuItemLevel class: used to preview a level
! GameView: don't reset model matrix when applying the view
+ CreationMenu: preview levels in a listview
- unused classes: MenuItemPresi + LevelPreviewer
! Vertex color data: it's RGBA not ARGB!
+ MenuItemButton: can be disabled
+ MenuItemString: simple menu item with text that can be selected
! MenuItemList: check index boundaries
+ update join menu: include a list for the selectable games
+ JoinMenu uses NetworkClient to get server list & include name in JoinMenu
! make MenuItemKeyboard work: use move() to check if string changed
! font: nullpointer check. happens if string is not set
+ GameSettings: add a debug variable (set to false)
! change default menu font color to 0xddeeeeff
+ store & restore user name in GameSettings, startAdvertise
! make MenuItemKeyboard font a bit smaller
+ WaitMenu: list connected clients (to be tested)
! Networking: don't drop signals coming from a client if we are not connected to ourself
+ Creation menu: join session to self
! TODO: store & load username to/from file (for testing: set name to 'test' for now)
+ start the game. IT WORKS! :D :D :D
! change texture filtering to linear & use texture wrap to avoid gaps between tiles
+ only enable game start button when we are connected to ourself
+ Game: use sensor calibration 1 sec before game starts
+ GameBase: separate initial player count & current player count
+ GameServer: implement game end
+ GameSettings has current game round int
! keep server background thread always running
+ stopAdvertise when starting the game
+ Game: handle game round ended
+ MenuItemStringMultiline class: multi line string menu item
+ Popup menus: used for error messages + game about to start info
+ popup menu show/hide mechanism in UIHandler
! add popup background texture
+ Game: use game about to start popup to show a countdown & set timeout to 5 sec
+ Game: handle network exceptions: show a popup when an error happens

! Networking: stopAdvertise lead to disconnect of clients

this problem was introduced in 1f7e3dc54b4016fc691614314ccafbb95b7ba637
+ Networking: clients can only join when advertising
+ some network error handling, don't run GameServer thread if not necessary
! endlessloop in WaitMenu when receiving unexpected network packets
+ clear the list of available servers when stop discovering
! networking: more rubust: check if already bound or named in doBindSession & doRequestName
+ Check for networking errors in the WaitMenu
+ nickname: allow spaces, introduce max len (15), name can start with 0-9
+ added mass and radius to GamePlayer
! stop advertising after game finished (fixes nickname renaming issues)
+ GameBase.eucDist() to calculate euclidean distance between to objects
+ add rectangle & GameWall skeleton class
+ Vector.angle() uses atan2

src/com/android/game/clash_of_the_balls/game/GameBase.java
! change Obstacle to Wall

- unneeded comment

! game (client+server): better game abort handling

+ keep screen on while game is in foreground
+ MainMenu: rename buttons to 'New Game' & 'Join Game' to make it clearer

+ CreationMenu: labels, introduce a label font in UIHandler
+ WaitMenu: show connected & max player count

Merge branch 'master' of https://code.vis.ethz.ch/git/dist_sys/clash_of_the_balls
+ added 2 more levels

+ improve performance: Matrix.rotateM() allocates memory, so avoid it (use RenderHelper)

this greatly decreases the need to collect garbage during the game
this also increases the frame rate by about 15%
Merge branch 'master' of https://code.vis.ethz.ch/git/dist_sys/clash_of_the_balls

! Model Matrix stack: don't resize on popModelMat, init model mat size = 6

we assume the model mat stack will grow again next frame so we never decrease
it's size (but it can still grow)
+ add 2 new background textures: brick & stone
+ test level that uses stone background
! use FloatMath wherever possible instead of Math
+ GamePlayer handleImapct: handle die() if impact with hole

Merge branch 'items_integration'
+ add a README file
! MenuItemLevel: place max players properly (cannot overlap with level anymore)

+ client side prediction

* move the game in client when not receiving network updates
* apply the sensor vector 1/2 RTT after sending it to the server
* when receiving a network update: go back 1/2 RTT, apply it,
then go forward 1/2 RTT
! use last RTT for current incoming packet (it was used with one packet delay)

+ client side smoothing of the item position update

if the new position update differs from the current position by a certain
amount, then use the next few frames to apply the position
! client: generate_events & do a game move also if received network updates
! smoothing of server position: do not change position when applying Event position
! client: do not move back & forth 1/2 RTT when receiving packets (does not work)
+ level_test_wall2.lev
- remove timestamp/sequence number from networking (because we use TCP)
- remove sequence number from game & events
+ set GameServer thread priority to maximum
c remove unneeded comment
+ client prediction can be disabled using GameSettings.client_prediction
